structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.text: It is hereby declared that in consideration of the contributions by members and in further consideration of benefits received by the state from the member's employment, KRS 161.220 to 161.710 shall constitute, except as provided in KRS 6.696, an inviolable contract of the Commonwealth, and the benefits provided herein shall, except as provided in KRS 6.696, not be subject to reduction or impairment by alteration, amendment, or repeal.
law.history: Amended 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 82, effective September 16, 1993. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 192, sec. 17, effective July 1, 1992. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 545, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 20, effective March 28, 1978.
